node.title: Losing the First Love
node.description: In His words to the church at Ephesus, Jesus commended this first century church for many things, but had one thing He held against them: they had lost their first love.  In this study Pastor Clark explores the biblical predictions of a falling away, or apostasy, in the time period soon after the passing of the apostles. A steady drift away from the clear teachings of the word of God indeed took place in the early centuries. Understanding this drift may help us understand God’s plan for us to return to the first love experience He wants us to enjoy with Him.
